title: Fork Yeah! The Rise and Development of illumos
speaker: Bryan Cantrill
summary: By the end of the '90s Sun was the last company to believe in Unix derivatives. From the Unix wars, to the acquisition by Oracle, Bryan Cantrill takes us through a humorous history of the operating sysyem, the community, and the future of open source development in Illumos.

title: Hardware/Software Co-design: The Coming Golden Age
speaker: Bryan Cantrill
summary: A history of hardware and future innovations

title: Debugging Under Fire: Keep your Head when Systems have Lost their Mind
speaker: Bryan Cantrill
summary: Tale of an outage at Joyent and what lessons can be drawn

title: Zebras All the Way Down
speaker: Bryan Cantrill
summary: The stack of abstractions we use is brittle

title: Systems that run forever self-heal and scale
